name: Gloom! Slay At Night
description:
Play as a young, inexperienced but still certified Ghost Slayer: Ecto Plasmius who is sent on a mission by his professor: Professor Fenton. 

What is the mission you may ask: Enter a haunted mansion at 3 am in the morning and slay some ghosts!!! 

Use your Polter. 45, Ghostbuster-3000, and Poltabuster-47 to slay your way through the mansion and collect the three keycards in order to escape the mansion. 

It's time to become the best ghost-slaying champion in the world because only the best and true ghost slayers slay at night!

Will you be able to slay all the ghosts and escape or will you become a ghost yourself?
